conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent isometric cutaway view with clear wall thickness and volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong dimensional transformation; walls and floors are clearly defined with accurate isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Most room adjacencies are correct; the bay window/window seat on the right is accurately represented as a protruding element.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen, bathroom fixtures, and dining table are logically placed. Sink and stove placements match 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and geometry. Points deducted (E6) for text artifacts 'UTILITY ROOM' remaining on the floor surface.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D floor plan are baked onto the floor texture in the 3D render.

summary: A highly faithful 3D conversion that accurately translates architectural wall geometry and room layout while maintaining professional isometric clarity.
